Trade/Device Name(s): Diazyme Direct HbA1c Assay (Enzymatic, On-Board Lysis)
Diazyme Direct HbA1c Assay Calibrator Set
Diazyme Direct HbA1c Assay Control Set
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Roche Modular P automated chemistry analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Diazyme Direct HbA1c Assay (Enzymatic, On-Board Lysis), calibrator and control sets for quantitative determination and monitoring of HbA1c in whole blood using automated chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of stable HbA1c in venous whole blood samples with on-board blood lysis; not for diagnosis or screening for diabetes, used for monitoring long-term glucose control in persons with diabetes in clinical laboratories
